## Status Definitions

- **âœ… Complete:** All tasks done, tests passing, quality gates passed, deployed/deployable
- **ğŸ”„ In Progress:** Tasks generated, actively being worked on
- **ğŸ“‹ Draft:** PRD finalized but tasks not yet generated (Phase 2 done, Phase 3 pending)
- **ğŸš« Blocked:** Cannot proceed due to dependencies or external blockers
- **ğŸ” Superseded:** Replaced by newer PRD, archived

---

## Completion Criteria (Definition of Done)

A PRD is marked **âœ… Complete** when ALL of the following are true:

- [ ] All parent tasks in task file marked `[âœ…]`
- [ ] All tests passing (unit, integration, E2E per CLAUDE.md requirements)
- [ ] Quality gates passed (lint, type-check, security, coverage thresholds)
- [ ] Test audit shows 100% coverage with no critical gaps (`@test-audit completed-only`)
- [ ] Database migrations executed and verified (if applicable)
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, API docs, architecture docs)
- [ ] Code reviewed and merged to main branch
- [ ] Deployed to target environment OR marked as deployable

## Auto-Update Triggers

This file is automatically updated by the following workflow phases:

| Phase | Trigger | Update Action |
|-------|---------|---------------|
| **@create-prd** | New PRD created | Add entry with status "ğŸ“‹ Draft", version 1.0, 0% completion |
| **@extend-prd** | Existing PRD extended | Increment version, reset status to "ğŸ”„ In Progress", recalculate % |
| **@generate-tasks** | Tasks generated from PRD | Update status to "ğŸ”„ In Progress", set initial task count |
| **@process-task-list** | Parent task completed | Update completion %, recalculate status |
| **@test-audit** | Audit validates completion | Check completion criteria, potentially mark "âœ… Complete" |
| **Manual** | User marks PRD as blocked/superseded | Update status with notes |

---

## Notes

- **Completion %** = (Completed Parent Tasks / Total Parent Tasks) Ã— 100
- **Status transitions:** Draft â†’ In Progress â†’ Complete (or Blocked at any point)
- **Extensions reset status:** Extending a Complete PRD changes it to In Progress
- **Superseded PRDs:** Mark old PRD as "ğŸ” Superseded" when replaced by newer version
